system.descriptionText: Until the end of the Turn, as long as Comrade is within Comms Range, whenever Character uses the Inspire Special Use of the Command Skill, each ally affected gains +20 to Tests to Resist Fear, Pinning, and Mind-Altering Psychic Powers until the end of their next turn.
